channel.title: music on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in music on Barefoot Rob

item.title: LouStar Banks of the Beautiful
item.description: 10:06 Thursday 11 January 2018 JST Really glad to hear LouStar has new tracks out! Not sure if this link will work, but I bought “Favourite” and “Not Gonna Lie” Not gonna lie, but “Favourite” is my favorite of the two. https://play.google.com/store/music/artist/Banks_Of_The_Beautiful

item.title: nin podcast
item.description: 17:48 Thursday 13 April 2017 JST I found Underneath It All, a nine inch nails podcast, and as a result signed up for Google Music so I can listen to Hesitation Marks… even though I already bought the album when it first came out… because I haven’t really listened to it, because I have not had a CD player for a long time.

item.title: piano recital with Mikarin
item.description: 23:24 Saturday 28 November 2015 JST After scoping the land in Okutama, Lin and I went to her sister’s place and enjoyed musical entertainment provided by her niece and nephews. Mikarin plays several instruments piano, xylophone, saxophone, recorder, (more?), and she played for us, including some of her own compositions.

item.title: Music I like
item.description: 14:29 Tuesday 06 October 2015 JST I just sent this to Satomi: This is the album my friend told me to listen to seven times: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sinsation by PIG https://www.dailymotion.com/video/x28yxj_pig-painiac-1_music https://remix.nin.com/ listen to tunes remixed by NIN fans AniKiko, my girlfriend in a parallel universe https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VDu_uKv7jgo Tori Amos, my girlfriend in a different parallel universe fav song by Tori: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_PDlGUdDF8Y DJ Jazzy Jeff and The Fresh Prince https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kr0tTbTbmVA https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OMnbw-AM4VA MC Speller by Muckafurgason https://deepelmdigital.

item.title: dream karaoke drink
item.description: ##07:42 Friday 10 May 2013 7:37am Friday 10 May 2013 In karaoke, singing “The Last Blueberry” by Anikiko, I wanted to fast forward to the good part so quickly consumed the drink from the song carton. It seemed a bit strange, but the guy with me agreed it was the fastest way to fast-forward the song: fast-drink the drink!
